text: Three Days of the Condor is a 1975 American mystery thriller directed by Sydney Pollack and was based on the 1974 novel Six Days of the Condor by James Grady. It stars Robert Redford, Faye Dunaway, Max von Sydow, Cliff Robertson, John Houseman, Addison Powell, Helen Stenborg, Walter McGinn and Tina Chen. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures and was nominated for an Academy Award in 1976. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1975 mystery movies Category:1975 thriller movies Category:1970s spy movies Category:American mystery movies Category:American spy movies Category:American thriller movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Sydney Pollack Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Movies set in Washington, D.C. Category:Movies about conspiracy theories
title: Three Days of the Condor
